divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing in front of my parents house in 1999, and I witnessed a disk shaped object in the Polo Fields Neighborhood hovering above the treetops, just outside the neighborhood above the woodline. Strangly, my parents do not recall seeing the craft. It's as if I saw it and they never remembered seeing it.
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Cumming
There were no other sightings in Cumming on or around July 15th 1999
Summary: disk with strobing lights in Cumming, Ga.
